pr_title: JDK15 : Add loadLibraryWithPath package access APIs & Invoke registerBootstrapLibrary() in JVM_LoadLibrary

timeline.bodyText: Perhaps this should call loadLibraryWithClassLoader(), which might fix the UnsatisfiedLinkError.
timeline.author: pshipton

replies.bodyText: Will look into it, mark this PR WIP.
replies.author: JasonFengJ9

replies.bodyText:
It doesn't appear the UnsatisfiedLinkError during the build process is related to this PR.
The two helper methods added were not invoked before this error.
In addition, the stacktrace doesn't show java.lang.ClassLoader or java.lang.Runtime which is the caller of these two new methods.
replies.author: JasonFengJ9

replies.bodyText: It seems there is a newly introduced jdk.internal.loader.NativeLibraries which doesn't work well with OpenJ9 ClassLoader.
replies.author: JasonFengJ9

replies.bodyText:
Before this jdk.internal.loader.NativeLibraries JDK15 update, System.loadLibrary(library) was used which calls ClassLoader.loadLibraryWithClassLoader(), and eventually invokes BytecodeInterpreter.hpp.inlClassLoaderLoadLibraryWithPath() which calls registerNativeLibrary().
After this update, internal.loader.NativeLibraries has its own private static native boolean load(NativeLibraryImpl impl, String name, boolean isBuiltin) which invokes JVM_LoadLibrary() and JVM_FindLibraryEntry(). This seems break OpenJ9 native library loading mechanism.
Restoring System.loadLibrary(library) within jdk.internal.loader.NativeLibraries can skip its natives and use OpenJ9 inlClassLoaderLoadLibraryWithPath() which fixes the  UnsatisfiedLinkError. However this approach requires a JCL patch.
@DanHeidinga @pshipton please comment.
replies.author: JasonFengJ9

replies.bodyText: Updated the PR and its description, please review.
replies.author: JasonFengJ9

timeline.message:
Add loadLibraryWithPath package access APIs for JDK15
Invoke registerBootstrapLibrary() in JVM_LoadLibrary

static void loadLibrary(Class<?> caller, File file) is added which calls
loadLibraryWithPath(String libName, ClassLoade loader, String
libraryPath);
static void loadLibrary(Class<?> caller, String libName) is added which
calls loadLibraryWithClassLoader(String libName, ClassLoader loader);
Invoke registerBootstrapLibrary() in JVM_LoadLibrary.

Signed-off-by: Jason Feng <fengj@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: This line can be removed since OpenJ9 doesn't support Java 1.4
timeline.author: pshipton
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -3577,69 +3577,25 @@ JVM_LoadSystemLibrary(const char *libName)
  *	DLL: jvm
  */
 
-/* NOTE THIS IS NOT REQUIRED FOR 1.4 */
+/* NOTE THIS IS NOT REQUIRED FOR 1.4

timeline.author: pshipton

replies.bodyText: and the tracepoint levels can be modified to level 2
replies.author: pshipton
